title: Varun Dhawan on dating Natasha Dalal: There is nothing to hide : Gossip, News - India Today
text:
Varun Dhawan on dating Natasha Dalal: There is nothing to hide Varun Dhawan makes his relationship with Natasha Dalal official. IndiaToday.in | Written by Charu Thakur A + A - 
Varun Dhawan and Natasha Dalal's frequent public appearances sparked dating rumours. However, time and again Varun dodged the question pertaining to their relationship status. But it seems Bollywood's Badrinath is all set to introduce his to-be-dulhania to the world. And the 29-year-actor surprised everyone when he walked hand-in-hand with Natasha at Shahid Kapoor 's pre-birthday bash on Sunday night. 
It seems Varun is all set to make his relationship with Natasha official now. In an interview to Filmfare magazine, Varun opened up about his relationship and said that there is nothing to hide. 
ALSO READ: Varun Dhawan's girlfriend Natasha Dalal insecure of his equation with female co-stars? 
When asked if he is cool to be seen in public with Natasha, he said, "I am cool about it. In fact, I've always been cool about it. There's nothing to hide. I just don't want the focus to shift from my career to the relationship. That's why I don't talk much about it." 
"What can one say about spending time with loved ones? I'm not denying anything at all, just that I don't like to discuss it," he added. 
The Dishoom actor is all praise for his girl and said that she is the one of the best people he has come across. "I see it (relationship) reaching a good place. She's quite a handful, so full credit to her for sticking by me. She's one of the best people I've come across in my life," he added. 
On the work front, Varun is awaiting the release of Badrinath Ki Dulhania opposite Alia Bhatt . The film is set to hit the screens on March 10.
